name: Click Here
description:
From the creator of the hit 2022 game Click Real Fast, comes the epic sequel that nobody has been waiting for!

Click in the designated location to win... Click outside of the designated location to lose. Easy to learn, hard to master.

Gather up to (and including) 100 friends, and prove that you can Click Here more than they can.

Features

  • Clicking
  • Multiplayer
  • Clicking
  • Blinding bloom effects
  • Many Colors
  • Clicking
  • Deafening Music
  • Special Effects
  • Clicking
  • And much more!

Test your reflexes, and mental stability, and Click HERE
